answer: The geometric approach to the standard model using Clifford algebra Cl_7 provides a foundation for understanding the symmetries and structures of particle physics, as seen in the model that advances a geometric approach to the standard model in terms of the Clifford algebra Cl_7 (hep-th/0103137).
